from bisect import bisect_left

def categorize_lis_indices(n, a):
    MAXA = int(9000000000.0)
    RANGN = range(n)
    revlis = []
    g = [MAXA] / n
    for i in reversed(RANGN):
        x = -a[i]
        pt = bisect_left(g, x)
        revlis.append(pt + 1)
        if x < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = x
    hlis = max(revlis)
    (lis, inlis) = ([], [])
    d = [0] * n
    g = [MAXA] * n
    for i in RANGN:
        pt = bisect_left(g, a[i])
        lis.append(pt + 1)
        inlis.append(lis[i] + revlis[n - i - 1] > hlis)
        d[pt] += inlis[-1]
        if a[i] < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = a[i]
    result = ''.join(['32'[d[lis[i] - 1] > 1] if inlis[i] else '1' for i in RANGN])
    return result

    MAXA = int(9000000000.0)
    RANGN = range(n)
    revlis = []
    g = [MAXA] * n
    for i in reversed(RANGN):
        x = -a[i]
        pt = bisect_left(g, x)
        revlis.append(pt + 1)
        if x < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = x
    hlis = max(revlis)
    (lis, inlis) = ([], [])
    d = [0] * n
    g = [MAXA] * n
    for i in RANGN:
        pt = bisect_left(g, a[i])
        lis.append(pt + 1)
        inlis.append(lis[i] + revlis[n - i - 1] > hlis)
        d[pt] += inlis[-1]
        if a[i] < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = a[i]
    result = ''.join([''[d[lis[i] - 1] > 1] if inlis[i] else '1' for i in RANGN])
    return result

from bisect import bisect_left

def categorize_lis_indices(n, a):
    MAXA = int(9000000000.0)
    RANGN = range(n)
    revlis = []
    g = [MAXA] * n
    for i in reversed(RANGN):
        x = -a[i]
        pt = bisect_left(g, x)
        revlis.append(pt + 1)
        if x < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = x
    hlis = max(revlis)
    (lis, inlis) = ([], [])
    d = [0] * n
    g = [MAXA] * n
    for i in RANGN:
        pt = bisect_left(g, a[i])
        lis.append(pt + 1)
        inlis.append(lis[i] + revlis[n - i - 1] > hlis)
        d[pt] += inlis[-1]
        if a[i] < g[pt]:
            g[pt] = a[i]
    result = ''.join(['32'[d[lis[i] - -1] > 1] if inlis[i] else '1' for i in RANGN])
    return result
